titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of lands to certain individuals in Butte County, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior, USDA.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-9.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 4.

action.text: Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 53 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 440 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 53.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 440 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit.
House resolved itself into the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union pursuant to H. Res. 53 and Rule XXIII.
The Speaker designated the Honorable J. Dennis Hastert to act as Chairman of the Committee.
GENERAL DEBATE - The Committee of the Whole proceeded with one hour of general debate.
The House rose from the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union to report H.R. 440.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Measure incorporated into measure S. 719 ordered to be reported.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-45.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 68.

bill.summary: 1/9/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey without consideration certain lands in Butte County, California, adjacent to the Plumas National Forest to eligible persons who make their claims within two years. Requires the Secretary to: (1) make the necessary surveys and property line markings; and (2) submit a copy of each deed to the Secretary of the Interior. Authorizes appropriations.
